content: Despite our continued performance, the macro environment has presented challenges to our financing and pushed out the timeline, forcing us to take immediate steps to rein in cash burn to the cost cutting measures announced in October. However, we have taken steps to materially decrease our cash flow to workforce reductions withdrawing from the RDOF program, which freed up an additional $17 million in cash that was restricted cover, which was restricted to cover these required letters of credit and a pause in the expansion into Las Vegas amongst other moves.
